website_summaries.verdict: A popular, portable lap desk perfect for on-the-go students and travelers.
pros: Lightweight design makes the desk easy to handle
Comes with two organizing trays ideal for holding phones or writing utensils
Lap pad made from comfortable, micro-bead cushions
cons: Lacks a built-in stopper at the edge of the tray, which makes laptops and other materials prone to slide off without careful supervision

customer_reviews.title: This College Girl Loves This Desk!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for both gaming (because the bottom of my laptop tends to get hot) and school work (because I like sitting on the couch and my lap is too low)! The second I put this on my lap I fell in love. My laptop has little skid-proof spots on the bottom so no issues with the sliding some people mentioned. Worth the price! I wanted something simple and comfortable but didn't like the prices of the other lap desks. This is absolutely perfect. I raved so much about mine that my boyfriend bought one too so now we can game side by side on the couch!!
customer_reviews.author: Larresa Kelpin

customer_reviews.title: Stable and serviceable!
customer_reviews.text: Serviceable lap desk with squishy microbead pads on the bottom. The plastic of the desktop is moderately flimsy and the plastic lip all around the underside gives it a cheap feel. I was surprised at how cheap the product feels. But this is clearly a tradeoff since the board is so lightweight! However, since I have been using this desk to do my computer-based homework, I have eliminated my overheating issues. The lap desk is a serviceable solution. It also works on multiple lap configurations, like if I tuck my legs under me and set it on the uneven "lap". I was pleased at how stable the product is!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent  LapDesk
customer_reviews.text: I am really impressed with the LapGear MyDesk. It's lightweight and well designed. It fits comfortably in my lap and is very stable. The surface is slippery, but I took the advice of another reviewer and used a piece of shelf liner when I am using my tablet. The hard surface works just fine when I'm coloring on it. It's large enough for pages from a full size adult coloring book to fit. Highly recommend this lap desk.
customer_reviews.author: RussellC

customer_reviews.title: OK, but replaced with better product.
customer_reviews.text: My only real problem with this is the fact that the padding on the back side does not cover the dents on the underside from the cell phone buckets, nor is the padding tall enough to prevent those plastic buckets from touching my legs, so they rub on my knees uncomfortably. I bought a different product that has padding across the entire bottom portion to replace this one.
customer_reviews.author: R. Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, lightweight, and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The cushioning on the bottom is comfortable, and the surface can fit a full size 15.6" laptop. It does not feel heavy to have on your lap, and makes for a good barrier between your laptop and your clothes. A clarification on the description: the two "storage compartments" advertised are the two holes at the top where you can put your phone and a couple of pens, there are no other compartments on the sides or the bottom. I would personally suggest a lap desk with a cooling fan if you're going to exclusively use this for a laptop, but if that's unnecessary for your purposes, then this gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Ayah Muted

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE of this listing!
customer_reviews.text: Review for: LAP GEAR MY DESK BLACK The lapDesk I got this time was not the same as this listing. AND the main photo of the item is not the same as the item you see when you scroll down. The item I received was completely different from both pictures. The one pictured WITHOUT the device ledge is a very good product and I would like to get another one of the exact same kind. I am afraid to order a third time for fear I will get the wrong one again.
customer_reviews.author: Sparkys_Fan

customer_reviews.title: Glad it was cheap a year later it broke after heavy use.
customer_reviews.text: Small issues from the start like the cushion was not thick enough to keep legs from going to sleep. The underneath lip digs into your skin and required me to use some rubber molding. My laptop always stays on this desk (tethered) even when I move it. Just over a year after purchase it has broken down the middle. There is a single BIG 1 foot crack in the middle because it flexes when the laptop is on it and when I pick it up to place on a table. It was used for several hours daily every day. So I'm going to try the LapGear XL and keeping my fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: Heartland IndianaTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Cheap compact option
customer_reviews.text: The construction is lightweight. The surface is a little small, which at first seems good, but then a slight movement of my Surface Pro and it slides off the back. The padding has very little give, so it doesn't form fit when it sits on my knee. Maybe it will soften with use. I have had it a couple weeks now and i haven't used it after the first time, so it didn't make a good first impression. I'll make it a point to use and see if it grows on me. At this cost it is a cheap solution and it serves purpose for limited space (maybe on a plane)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great LapDesk
customer_reviews.text: I really like this LapDesk! It is comfortable to use and I'm sure offers much greater ventilation for my computer than my lap would. My only complaint is that my computer slides around on it somewhat easily so if I am leaning over and tip it a little, it starts to slide off fairly easily. But as long as you're keeping it level and/or being conscious of holding your computer in place while tilting at all, it's great! Also, if your computer has rubbery/grippy feet I feel like this wouldn't be an issue. I have a new MacBook Pro and the "feet" (whatever those things are called...I'm not super tech savvy) don't have a whole lot of traction.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Kleinman

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Good size for a laptop. I love the slot for the cell phone Cons: The laptop slides off the desk since there is no barrier at the bottom to keep it from falling towards you. The surface is slippery and the supposed bean bag cushion isn't that comfortable. I would probably suggest getting a bigger desk that has a grippy surface to it. Don't make a mistake like me and trash the packaging until you've tried this out.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Giovanni

customer_reviews.title: It does wear out, but still worth it
customer_reviews.text: I'm about to buy my fourth one of these in black. The padded underside does break down after a while, but for the price of a cheeseburger lunch, I don't see that as a big deal. I write long hours on my laptop in a recliner and couldn't do my job without this lap desk. I like the two recesses, I keep my backup Seagate hard drive hooked up to my laptop all the time and it fits perfectly into the one on the left. It would be nice if they made this in more "adult" colors besides black but that's a quibble.
customer_reviews.author: JKF

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken. The top portion of the handle was broken into. This was clearly a design flaw. Sitting on your lap you could feel the plastic bowing in the middle at the stress point which is probably why it broke. I doubt it would have stood up to constant use. Not sure if this was a return or just poor workmanship but evidently it was not going to work so it was returned. I do NOT recommend this laptop desk. The cushioning underneath was flimsy and the plastic on top was cheap. I ordered another laptop desk and am very pleased with it. Try Sofia + Sam Mini Memory Foam Lap Desk available on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: sonya

customer_reviews.title: Honest Buyer
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, not bulky, good price. I really like the cushion underneath. I mainly use this to hold my laptop. The cushion underneath is so comfy that sometimes I don't even feel like I have my laptop resting on my legs when I'm surfing the web. Its kinda weird but true and it's the only way I can describe it. HOWEVER, I do wish the little compartment for your phone or small office accessory was a tad bigger. My phone wont fit if its in the case, Galaxy S7. So if you just have a thin phone case you should be fine. This is the only reason for my 4 stars. Other than that, it's a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Mina

customer_reviews.title: YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Initially, I was quite satisfied with this for an iPad in-bed desk support. But just after 2 weeks the seams broke and tiny styrofoam pellets seeped out on me and into my bed! I will not replace it with the same unsubstantial product.
customer_reviews.author: B. B. Walker

customer_reviews.title: OK but missing grip for the lap top
customer_reviews.text: I have a Mac and it slides right off this thing. There is no grip on the actual surface which was an issue for me. I really enjoyed the design (except sliding of my laptop). It has a couple of soft pillows on the bottom which feel nice on your legs. The thing is pretty sturdy and for the price it is a good find. I am writing this review using it right now if that tells you anything. However, if they could add something at the bottom to keep the laptop in place I would gladly bump this up to 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Not Ideal for my needs
customer_reviews.text: This wasn't comfortable to pick up and it slanted too much. In fact it made my laptop slide forward. I had a previous version of this laptop desk that is very sturdy feeling so I'll stick with that until I find anothe rone at least as comfy as this one is (that I already own). I wanted to like it as this oe one I use bottom that sits on my knees is getting pretty flat from constant use.
customer_reviews.author: RobynAZ

customer_reviews.title: Not right for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: Looks as pictured. Seems to be good quality. It's a bit small for me and I am a small woman (5ft) tall and slender. It has a very slick surface and the "cup holder" is not useful for anything other than small objects...I use it to paint my nails so it's great for holding the polish. When I tried to use it for my art projects though it was just too slippery which makes it a fight instead of a help. I would recommend this for a child to use on the floor or perhaps a small laptop with some sort of grip on the bottom. Looks very nice though and stores easily.
customer_reviews.author: torrey dunn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little lap desk.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this little lap desk. It’s just the right size to sit in a office chair with arms and it fits between the arms. It’s super lightweight. The only problem I had and this is my stupidity...I leaned on it where the handle is and cracked it. Still usable but wish I hadn’t done that. So I guess the plastic could be a little more durable and I could be a little less thoughtless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good for people who arnt planning to get much use out of it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 1 month ago and it is already broken! The pillows underneath make it comfortable and less flimsy as well. Without the pillow, it would snap right in half since it is plastic and thin plastic at that. If you need a desk for a mouse as well or a big project, this is not for you. It is mainly for small tasks like writing, drawing, reading, computer only
customer_reviews.author: AngelOfLight

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy lap desk, good size
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy lap desk with comfortable padding underneath. The size is just right; I use this for my coloring books when I want to sit away from the table. The little cubbys at the top hold several pencils, my pencil grips and sharpeners easily. I can shift this into many positions and still be able to use the surface. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A well thought out design
customer_reviews.text: My wife has had numerous lap desks. She likes this one best. Instead of a single cushion pocket that allows the desk to shift around, it has two separate pockets that prohibit unplanned movement. The molded pockets at top are great for holding a pen, pencil, small notepad and phone. The carry handle makes it easy to transport. The added touch of a curved bottom surface to fit around the tummy is part of its well thought out design.
customer_reviews.author: Nor R. Brunschwyler

customer_reviews.title: this desk is exactly what l wanted, it is ...
customer_reviews.text: this desk is exactly what l wanted, it is simple yet completely practical. For people that have problems with their computer slipping it is the fault of your device not the desk. l didn't want anything heavy and clumsy, this product is just right..thanks..lane krause
customer_reviews.author: lane

customer_reviews.title: It is a decent laptop
customer_reviews.text: I just got it this morning, and I am overall satisified with my purchase. The table provides nice cushion for my legs. The only thing is that if you take your hands off the laptop, the laptop slides down. The sliding can get pretty annoying, but I am going to buy some cabinet liners like others have said to prevent the sliding. The table is also not that big for my laptop, but it works, and for the price it is doable.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Pascarella

customer_reviews.title: Eh....Getting a Different One
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. As others have said, the surface is slick and anything you put on it (laptops included) easily slide around or off if you're not careful. I could overlook that, but the surface is also slightly bowed up in the middle. Any rubber feet you have on the bottom of your laptop don't work so hot, since they can't grab the surface. (Specifically a MacBook Air) It's worth spending a few extra bucks to get a better one.
customer_reviews.author: G213

customer_reviews.title: Great lap desk, not so good for wireless keyboard.  lol
customer_reviews.text: This was made well, but didn't suit my purpose which was to put my wireless keyboard on it. There wasn't enough room for my mouse. It was still top quality and as a lap desk alone I'm sure it was great. The cushioning is firm, not like a bunch of loose bean bag beans like some. It was also quite comfortable on my lap.
customer_reviews.author: meregoddess

customer_reviews.title: Let your device breathe and extend its life!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the new 15.6 inch HP Envy's we got for the family. These are lightweight and functional. Easy to tuck away. Now we don't have to worry about shortening the life of our devices because they can't fully breathe and ventilate because they are sitting on fabric (your lap. your bed. the carpet because you're sitting on the floor) and can't breathe. Take the time to use a lapdesk to extend the life of your electronic devices by properly ventilating them. This LapGear MyDesk is reasonably priced and does the job well.
customer_reviews.author: Wysdom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this some time ago and have been using it consistently for over 2 months. It's perfect for my 2 in 1 laptop by holding it stable in my lap. I use it almost daily for my online classes.
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee Webster

customer_reviews.title: It is light and easy to handle which is Important to me as I ...
customer_reviews.text: Operates as advertised. For the cost, I was willing to make some modifications to fit my particular needs. It is light and easy to handle which is Important to me as I have physical disabilities and use a wheelchair. It is stable, has good air circulation to keep the lap cool, adequate storage for writing instruments and phone.
customer_reviews.author: heartfelt44

customer_reviews.title: Decent for use with a Kindle, books or word puzzle/crossword books in a recliner.
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up to use instead of a pillow while sitting and reading, or working on word puzzles - pillows don't work so well for those. It has a smooth, easily cleanable surface on top, with spots to hold pens, styluses, or other bits and bobs. The back has pads of two sizes with space in between. This seems a bit odd at first, but works nicely to ensure they both stay at the right height to tilt the surface of the lap desk towards you.
customer_reviews.author: Goth Gone Grey

customer_reviews.title: Helpful but...
customer_reviews.text: First off this product is very useful if you use a laptop. I've used it on my lap or on a tabletop to boost my screen height. It's light weight enough to bring with me to the cafe. It is however made cheaply, when removing the tags the stitching came loose and it started losing the little foam bits inside so I had to restitch it. The handle on top also broke, I think it got stepped on. If you're careful with it, it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: TreasureLord

customer_reviews.title: A very comfortable padded lap desk! The only drawback for me was the size.
customer_reviews.text: I use my notebook PC ALL THE TIME in my lap while sitting in my chair! I ordered this lap desk because my old one became very uncomfortable on my lap because it did not have under side pads. This one is very comfortable however, the only draw back that I can acknowledge is the size. I have a 15.6" screen notebook PC and it does not leave very much room for my wireless mouse. Fortunately for me I arm on my recliner works fine for the mouse with a leather mouse pad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for drawing!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old son loves to draw and is always looking for a box or something to put his paper on. I saw this and got it for him for Christmas. It's the perfect size. Soft cushions make it easy on his legs. There are a couple of little holders for pens, etc. A really nice, basic lap desk.
customer_reviews.author: boomersgang

customer_reviews.title: Sufficient but expect a slippery surface
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Sufficient little lapdesk, ergonomic and comfortable. Raised in back by larger bolster. Cons: Pockets are a nice touch, but they are a little odd since they are curvy shaped which doesn't exactly fit our squared off devices and notepads. Reason "4 of 5" stars: I wish the surface wasn't so slippery, my laptop slides right off if I move an inch.- Some thin rows of nonslip padding would be a nice added touch.
customer_reviews.author: j.d.

customer_reviews.title: Great for school work
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this to do her homework on. She uses it every single day after school to do her work on her bed. It has compartments for her pens and pencils. She also used it to eat off of when she eats in her room.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Unexpected Bonus
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I was tired of my laptop burning my legs, plus it kept overheating and shutting down because the heat had nowhere to go. This lap desk has prevented both of those things from happening. As an unexpected bonus, it keeps me from looking down so far to see what I'm looking at, which keeps my neck from getting stiff.
customer_reviews.author: t smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect laptop desk
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my aunt. She likes to do word puzzles while relaxing and watching tv. This fits on her lap nicely and is comfortable without being too hot or too soft. She likes the top part, a place for her pen and a little lip at the bottom to keep her book from slipping off.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Multi-purpose Lap Desk
customer_reviews.text: Love this lap desk. It's perfect for my needs. So much easier to use my laptop; no more hot lap. I have a place to put my cell phone and pencils/pens. The cushions underneath are comfortable as well. I also use it as a work surface or when I'm looking at a magazine or just having a snack.
customer_reviews.author: Nallea

customer_reviews.title: Pads deflated
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for a couple of years. I really liked it, but now the pads underneath have flattened so much it does NOT do anything. It would have been nice if they were filled with something more substantial.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Watson

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than I expected. Same complaints a other reviewers. Slick surface. Feels cheap (though you don’t pay much for it). But the surface issue was too much for me to deal with. Went to B&N and bought a bigger better (yes, more expensive) lap desk. Plan to return this one ASAP
customer_reviews.author: RoB

customer_reviews.title: Slippery surface and not very wide.
customer_reviews.text: Product much smaller than I thought. Phone holder doesn't work well.....thought it would hold phone for reading but it sits too far down inside for that :( surface is slippery so items don't stay put if tipped even slightly!
customer_reviews.author: MM_review

customer_reviews.title: Compacr and comfortable...
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable padding rests evenly on thighs, nice size for use in my recliner... fits between the armrests... a little longer/deeper top pockets would be more helpful, as wound a little lip or pencil railing at bottom edge... but this is still a good product and serves its purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: patty jaye logan

customer_reviews.title: Best I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very reasonably priced lapboard, with a feature that makes it the best I have ever owned. The padded bottom is in two parts, being separated by a four inch open space, making a air-space that keeps a laptop from conducting heat, or just keeping the coziness factor down in non-laptop use. This lapboard is also noticeably lighter than the three owned previously, too. It is plenty large enough to hold a book, crossword puzzle, plate of food, etc. However, it would be skimpy to play real-card solitaire, if anyone plays with paper cards, anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my MacBook Pro
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect thing for folding my MacBook and phone while I'm working from home. While it is small (you might want to get out the tape measure if you have a big laptop), it perfect for me. It's comfortable with the padding and even has room for my mouse.
customer_reviews.author: sspan3

customer_reviews.title: Simple Lap Desk
customer_reviews.text: We use this for everything. It's light weight and the cushions on the bottom add comfort on your lap. So far, we have had this for three years and it has held it's purpose. It's still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: renee

customer_reviews.title: Small, well-made and functional
customer_reviews.text: This is great! It is small , lightweight and curved so it fits well around your hips/waist and within a chair. It is shown here with a 13” iPad Pro and apple keyboard. My iphone and some pens fit in the deep wells behind it. I like the lap desk so much I went to order 3 more as gifts and the price had gone up $3 just a few days after my first order. Quite disappointing. ;-(.
customer_reviews.author: California Dreamin'

customer_reviews.title: Great, but prepare to repurchase after 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: I find this item necessary for working away from my desk, the only problem I have with it is that it only lasts about 6 months. I have had about 3 of these LapGear lap desks, and they always seem to get a hole in the padding underneath and leak pellets all over the place. It can be sealed up easily, but not before losing a lot of its stuffing. Always disappoints me. I will continue to repurchase them until I find a better option.
customer_reviews.author: Rose S.

customer_reviews.title: Great size plus light weight!!
customer_reviews.text: I received my order with the desk top being damaged. I was very impressed with the company I purchased it from. I requested a replacement, got the instructions and within 2 days had a new one. I returned the damaged one with no expense to me and no hassle. I love the light weight and size of the desk. I use it while relaxing on the couch in the evening. It doesn't get hot on my legs and the two pockets in front are the right size for small items I want to keep handy. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good to use but not so durable.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for a few few weeks now. I can say that it's really useful but not so durable. When I leaned forward a bit with my arm putting just a little bit of weight on it it snapped right where the handle is. Thankfully it's still usable and the handle is still there.
customer_reviews.author: Dominik

customer_reviews.title: This looked perfect......
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was just what I was looking for -- and it was, except for one thing. The handle broke in the middle the first day I had it. Other than that it was beautiful and I was delighted with it. However, the handle is very weak and can't support picking it up with a laptop on it.
customer_reviews.author: Whibley

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly, but the top surface is slippery
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for over a year, and the top is very, very slippery. As someone that uses their laptop on their bed, I needed something so it doesn't slide down. I ended up putting a non slip mat over it and it works perfectly! The beads inside has never popped out.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Fits my Yoga 720 13" with Room for a Mouse
customer_reviews.text: I have to have a mouse, even with a laptop. This little desk is just enough room for my Yoga 720 13" and my mouse. (In fact I'm using the desk while I type this.) I love how light weight the lap desk is as well. Perfect in the car or on the couch. Really pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey RTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great desk and great price
customer_reviews.text: I have had 2 previous lap desks--one in high school and college. I ordered this one to use with my iPad Pro and for my adult coloring books. My iPad Pro with keyboard fits perfectly. The desk is on the smaller side and fits nicely in the space between my coach and end table. The handle makes it easy carry.
customer_reviews.author: J. Powell

customer_reviews.title: Calling bull on picture of everything sitting neatly on it
customer_reviews.text: The plastic the top is made from makes everything slide off of the desk and I literally mean everything. This is my biggest complaint, its not a very good design considering theres a slight slant to it. Storage holes would only hold a few crayons, they're not deep enough to stand anything up in. On the plus side, it does sit comfortably on my lab, whatever thats worth.
customer_reviews.author: A. Queen

customer_reviews.title: My mom loves it. Great for her to use while doing crosswords, etc.
customer_reviews.text: My mom loves it. She's elderly and loves doing crosswords, etc. She needed something she could carry around with her so she wouldn't have to set up a TV tray or other table each time she wanted to do a crossword puzzle, write a letter or anything else. This was just perfect for her and she uses it daily.
customer_reviews.author: John Pullum

customer_reviews.title: Weight and Quality of a Cafeteria Tray
customer_reviews.text: If you like thin & flimsy, this will work for you. I should have let the price clue me in to the thickness and construction, But it is no better than a cheap cafeteria tray on your lap. I returned it and got a better (and more expensive) product.
customer_reviews.author: CWL

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is a very useful instrument, especially for people that work from home and feel the need to move and work from different places. Comfortable to place your laptop and work on for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Narayan Reddy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the one who works so much
customer_reviews.text: Using a TV tray is nice but not comfortable enough when on the couch. This is easy to use in a sit down or lay down position. Cleaning is easy - wipe down. Doesn’t feel uncomfortable on your lap for a long period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Stamper

customer_reviews.title: Great lapdesk
customer_reviews.text: I have now bought 2 of these one in black and one in pink. I use mine to play and work on my 17 inch laptop when i'm at home. These work great and I highly recommend them if you doing a lot of work in your comfy chair.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Blackwood

customer_reviews.title: Slippery sucker!
customer_reviews.text: My laptop slides all around on the hard plastic surface! I have to keep adjusting it. Phone holder does not hold my phone securely. The work surface is slightly small for a laptop and mouse... May work well if you are just using the Trac pad. Overall, I was disappointed with my purchase. After 2 days of use, I purchased a different lap desk. I am hoping it fits my needs better.
customer_reviews.author: Texan

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: This lap desk is light and small, and easily slid under a couch for storage when not in use. I recently started grad school online, and this is perfect to have for using my laptop or writing/reading. The only issue is that the cushion seems to have lost some effectiveness fairly quickly, but with how affordable this was I expected it to not be completely perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: This desk serves its purpose. I just wanted something to put my laptop on while I sit on the couch or in bed and make sure my computer doesn’t get overheated. This is exactly what I was looking for and is lightlight. The surface area itself is smaller than past lap desks I’ve had though. For this price I would recommend. There are, however, much nicer and multi functional lap desks out there.
customer_reviews.author: MasonDixon

customer_reviews.title: Cushions collapse in less than 5 months.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this lap desk for 5 months now. I use it to set my laptop on while sitting in my chair. The surface itself is holding up well, but the cushions on the bottom have collapsed to the point that the edges of the desk dig into my legs. My wife just refilled them with "bean bag chair beads" and it is good again. But if I need another, it won't be this one.
customer_reviews.author: S. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Solid and functional
customer_reviews.text: My tweens love this for doing their homework, drawing, or computer time. The size is good for a 15" laptop or for paper worksheets. The pad cover is a very soft fabric with a long nap, and the pad feels like it's filled with mini styrofoam balls which are lightweight but provide a substantial cushion. The built-in pockets are a great feature to keep pencils from rolling away. It seems sturdy enough to last a long time. No bad smell.
customer_reviews.author: CityMouse

customer_reviews.title: works great with recliner
customer_reviews.text: . I love this but it could have used a little more padding because I think over time it will compress but perfect for now. my computer a dell inspirion has rubber feet and computer does not slide on me. it works perfectly with my recliner up and computer on my lap. this pad is light and with the handle is easy to carry. I only have the use of one hand and this lapgear is great. I use my mouse on my armchair. I have actually gotten blisters on knee from computer heat and this definitely protects my knees. my computer does not seem to be running as hot being on the hard surface
customer_reviews.author: lynn p.

customer_reviews.title: Love this lap desk!!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this lap desk. I have been searching for one that I could use while I'm off on medical leave. This one is not only comfortable, but stays put and keeps everything in place. I have used it for my lap top, to put my cell phone where I can reach it easily and have had absolutely no trouble with this at all. I even purchased adult coloring books for when I'm off, and this will be perfect for it. I cannot find a con at all. Great product and very well made!
customer_reviews.author: Thrivin T

customer_reviews.title: Too tilted and everything slides off
customer_reviews.text: The earlier review that said it's too angled and everything slides off was correct. I was hoping there would be a slightly higher edge around the lap desk, but there's nothing. I have to put something under the lower end to try and make it level or my laptop, mouse, ink pen or anything else slides right off. Even though my mouse doesn't need a pad, I use an old one which gives it a little traction and it doesn't slide off as quick. No wonder it was less expensive than the others. I won't buy another like this, but will use it for now.
customer_reviews.author: A. Audi

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when receiving this product because it was the perfect size for my MacBook and extremely lightweight BUT that excitement didn't last long. After only a few uses the fabric tore and began spilling out the small white beads. So my search for a lightweight durable lap desk continues. Wish I could return!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: simple
customer_reviews.text: This lap desk is functional, lightweight, and super simple. I didn't like the 2-pillow style. (One-pillow styles are much better for being able to adjust the angle on your lap.) The handle is handy, but the top has a lip underneath that pushes into your fingers when carrying. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Cramped
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive this as a replacement to my other lap desk but now I'm stuck buying another desk. It is too small for my laptop and barely has enough room to read and take notes for class. Plus the padding is angled for a table and not a lap, bad design I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: tlsdavis

customer_reviews.title: Good product at a good price!
customer_reviews.text: This is SO handy! I bought 3 and all 3 are used almost daily. It is great for about anything that requires a hard surface. It is plenty steady on a lap. Ours have been used for eating, writing, surface for tablet or laptop too! They are well made too, and the price is good.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Tomten

customer_reviews.title: Not Enough Padding
customer_reviews.text: The padding on the bottom is not good enough you still feel the bottom of the plastic holders pressing into your legs when sitting on your lap. Defeats the purpose of paying for a padded laptop holder.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect lightweight lap desk
customer_reviews.text: Almost perfect lightweight lap desk. I say almost because it could be just 1 inch bigger all the way around. My 15 1/2 inch fits but that is all it will fit. The slots in it are pretty much useless when my laptop is on it. I like the slots when I'm using my smaller sketch pad though. It's nice to have a place for my pencils and such.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy it!
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. It sits on your lap. My MacBook Air slides off of it and hit the floor a few times when I had to get up and put it on the coffee table for any reason. It doesn't prevent you from getting hot, regardless of what other folks say. My spouse used it with an IBM thinkpad and he doesn't like it either. I now use an old small rectangular amazon box and that works much better at keeping me from getting hot from the computer.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Very nice little lap desk!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my hubby since he likes the (different) lap desk that I use so much. It's perfect--lightweight, well balanced, not too large but big enough to accommodate his medium size laptop. The cushioning on the bottom is comfortable and ergonomic. I like this one better that the one I have been using, so I'll be buying one of these next!
customer_reviews.author: dianafoot

customer_reviews.title: Light weight..but sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have ordered this lap desk. I enjoy it so much I ordered one for a friend. Light weight but sturdy. Well worth the price. Would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Derdermoore

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I like it, ,but I am unable to use the slots with a 15.4" laptop. Just wish it were a couple inches wider so I can put my phone in the available slots. Also wish there was a stopper at the bottom so the laptop won't slide off. It's lightweight and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: My lap top sits perfect on it and I am always on my recliner ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time.... My lap top sits perfect on it and I am always on my recliner with feet up playing my computer games. Just bought another one for my grandson who just got his first laptop
customer_reviews.author: Grandma1

customer_reviews.title: I Couldn't Be Happier.
customer_reviews.text: Would definitely by another when needed. My old lap desk had under padding that made my legs uncomfortable and over-heated. This LapGear lap desk is just wonderful. My legs stay comfortably cool because they can breath. It's just the right size for my 15.6" lap top too. Now I have to set a timer so I know I've been typing too long and should take a break. Hope they keep making more like this.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma C.

customer_reviews.title: The size is perfect for a women
customer_reviews.text: It fills my needs perfectly. The size is perfect for a women. The curve on the bottom rested comfortably against my body. I wasn't sure about the 2 pockets described but I like them very much. I do a lot of needle work and they come in very handy to keep tract of all the miscellaneous items that usually tend to get lost. The two cushions on the bottom gently angle the table toward you. Overall, I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs!
customer_reviews.text: From the couch to the bed, this is perfect for my 15" laptop. My creative work is on my laptop and this keeps me able to work whenever I'm not at a table. It's light, comfortable and I don't feel any heat from my laptop like before. Very happy with this! :)
customer_reviews.author: efu671

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lap desk.
customer_reviews.text: I love this lap desk. Love the pockets that hold pens, phone, etc. It's sturdy, yet lightweight. Everything is flush, so your computer or drawing pad has nothing to catch on, or bump into...and it's just a great size. Not too big, not too small. This, and clip style reading light....and you're good to go. This is my second one...this new one is in the car with my beach chair. :)
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Lap
customer_reviews.text: Great desk for lap. Just don't like that computer constantly slides off
customer_reviews.author: M. Neal

customer_reviews.title: I like this lap desk to use while doing hand sewing ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this lap desk to use while doing hand sewing in front of the TV. It supports my project nicely and the holders at the front of the desk work nicely for holding small supplies i.e. pins, scissors, threads etc. The only drawback for me is the surface is a bit to slippery especially if I'm using it as a writing surface.
customer_reviews.author: GIJane279

customer_reviews.title: Great for so many uses and lightweight for portability!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my art! I can work on a table and this elevates my acrylic or watercolor paper to just the right height for painting. It also has enough surface to tape down a 9x12 sheet with room to spare. My art group was impressed with the idea!
customer_reviews.author: S. Britton

customer_reviews.title: It works great! It doesn't actually keep the laptop cool
customer_reviews.text: It works great! It doesn't actually keep the laptop cool, and the plastic surface can even get hot too. I use it as a platform for my laptop in bed while I'm lying on my side. It's the perfect size for my Macbook and easy to move. I've had no need to use any of those fancy grooves yet but those are a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Noonoh

customer_reviews.title: Padding missing in areas
customer_reviews.text: Horrible Packaging. Box broken and halfway opened. Product cheap and made in China. Padding missing under lap desk at key points. The desk has NO PADDING under the utensils holders or under the handle. It hits my knees and is very uncomfortable with the sharp plastic. Pay more and find a quality lap desk.
customer_reviews.author: Nukedawg

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 12 year old to do homework, use her laptop, color. We have a small car and she can comfortable use it with all three kids sitting kinda squished in the backseat!
customer_reviews.author: Kbeth346

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I've had mine for 2 years now and it works great. Keep it by my chair and use it often. An excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MonkeyB

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but laptop slips
customer_reviews.text: I like it, it’s useful for when I’m in bed typing. But my laptop DOES slide down if I lean in any way. It needs a non slip top or coating of some kind.
customer_reviews.author: Arielle

customer_reviews.title: I like to use a mouse
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a laptop table when I'm in bed. My laptop is basically the size of the table. I like to use a mouse, so the laptop has to hang over a little bit. But it works. My husband uses it once in a while, on the rare occasion we eat in bed. It's strong and durable, and serves its purpose. I just wish it was a little bit bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Healon

customer_reviews.title: Good deal, durable product.
customer_reviews.text: Love this desk. It’s comfortable on my lap but doesn’t make my legs sweat like crazy. I also like the storage area for phones and pens. Good product for the price. I’ve been learning to hand letter so there’s pencil and eraser everywhere and it always wipes clean easily.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: It's a good lap desk - you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: All in all... this desk is functional and light. Made of plastic with padding underneath to keep your legs comfortable. No issues. Nothing overwhelming (good or bad) about the desk.
customer_reviews.author: Laurice

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Light
customer_reviews.text: This lap desk is nice and light. I bought this for my Mom to use in bed, and it is light, without the bulk of a few other lap desks I looked at for her. The size is perfect for her to use in bed or on the couch.
customer_reviews.author: QuietLady

customer_reviews.title: Soft Bottom
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed when I received the product. Has pockets for cell phone/pens. The soft bottom really got me, I was expecting a weird fiber feel but it is so soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen T.

customer_reviews.title: Use this all the time
customer_reviews.text: Great value and makes use of laptop while on the couch much easier and ergonomic. I did not deduct a star (because this was a great price compared to other options), but I do recommend a little swatch of grip liner to keep the laptop from moving around.
customer_reviews.author: CorgiFolk

customer_reviews.title: good quality and price
customer_reviews.text: This replaced one my hubby wore out. The little cups aren't really necessary for his purposes but they may come in handy so something doesn't roll off. The cushion on the bottom is a good amount, hopefully it will last for a while.
customer_reviews.author: C. Crocker

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: The lapdesk is nice but it's a little too small. I am using a Microsoft Surface 3, which is a tablet, and it barely fits on here. The phone holder at the top is very shallow and my phone keeps falling out of it. I would not really recommend this product for someone who will be using it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Brad R Biagi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and weight for a young child
customer_reviews.text: My grandson son loves to color and draw but also to watch TV. This way he can do both and it has places to put everything he needs to keep him drawing.
customer_reviews.author: Myrna

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: Very handy for using laptop while sitting in chair or couch. Comfy foam on bottom feels good and keeps heat from laptop away. Friends and relatives like them so much I've given a few away and had to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Nice desk.
customer_reviews.text: Nice desk...I could use a couple more inches on the side but it's comfortable on my lap. I love the hard top/sides. The old lap desk I had was made from layers that came apart after several years use. I like this one better.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hutchinson

product_meta.title: LapGear MyDesk Lap Desk - Black - Fits up to 15.6 Inch laptops - Style No. 45348
product_meta.description: The MyDesk Lap Desk - it’s like it was made for you. The curved edge conforms to your lap for a cozy fit, and the work space is large enough to accommodate up to 15.6" laptops. Smooth, flat surface area provides proper ventilation for your laptop. Dual-Bolster cushions feature an innovative airflow channel so you and your laptop stay cool and comfy. 2 built-in compartments make organization easy- perfect for a toddler storing Crayons or an executive stashing paperclips.
feature_bullets: All-Purpose Lap Desk with a built-in handle, curved edge and super-soft fleece cushion
Dual-bolster cushion provides the correct angle for optimal screen viewing
Micro-bead filled cushion conforms to the lap, providing comfort and stability
2 built-in storage compartments for organizing accessories

specifications.Manufacturer: Creative Manufacturing, LLC dba Lap Desk
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,425 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
